name: smart_buyer_matching_agent
description: A smart agent that uses a real-time datastore to find and vet potential buyers. It identifies potential buyers for the farmer's produce from a real-time datastore, and helps negotiate terms.

skills.name: Datastore-Powered Buyer Matching
skills.description: Identifies potential buyers by querying a real-time Vertex AI Search datastore. Helps with negotiations based on retrieved buyer profiles.
examples: Find a buyer for my 5 tons of premium potatoes from the datastore.
I want to sell organic basmati rice, can you find a verified buyer?
Search the buyer database to connect me with purchasers for my crops.
